name: This Was Your Futures – Every Day is Play
description: Following the This Was Your Future series by @CuriousMachine, this piece is created from a collection of 31 glitched arcade boot screens created for Game Paused’s Every Day is Play book – http://www.gamepaused.net/books/everydayisplay/. This series dives into the pixels of the glitch, rendering them huge and further abstracted, drawing from the likes of Rothko for inspiration; like hyper-RGB 2362 x 2362 pixel paintings.
